title: Echoes of Lumina
description: A mystical digital art piece exploring the relationship between light and shadow in urban environments.
pitch: A digital exploration of urban mysticism through light and shadow manipulation.
challenge: Capturing the ethereal quality of urban light while maintaining technical precision in digital art.
development: Created using Photoshop and Illustrator, with extensive photo manipulation and digital painting techniques.
outcome: Exhibited in 3 digital art galleries, featured in 2 design publications, and sold as limited edition prints.

gallery.title: Main Composition
gallery.description: Primary artwork showing light and shadow interplay
